name: Lillith
description:
Updated and Finished.

You found a young girl outside a abandoned village and she has last her stuffed bunny. Help the young girl by searching though the village and find her bunny.   

Controls:

W- Forward 

A- Left

S-Backwards 

D-Right

E-Open Doors/Pull Lever

Space Bar-Jump

Shift- Run

Right Mouse Click-Shoot Left Gun, Pick up item

Left Mouse Click-Shoot right gun
